Indices.Message:
<COL ffdc78>"Enemies with Flaming Bodies"</COL>
are
enemies without physical form that continue to
wander while enveloped in flames even after death
and losing their bodies.
Because flames are constantly generated from
their bodies, if one gets too close for too long,
they will catch fire and spread.
They can be quite troublesome adversaries.

For some enemies with flaming bodies, you can use
skills with <COL ffdc78>healing effects on
contact</COL> or capture them with the Magick Eye:
True Aid from Element Archer to contain the flames
emitted from their bodies and put them in a <COL
ffdc78>"quenched state"</COL>.
In a quenched state, they will no longer catch
fire even if you get close to them.
In addition, the amount of damage inflicted
increases and there is also the benefit that the
enemy becomes more susceptible to losing their
balance.
So, healers should actively strive to put enemies
in the quenched state in their strategies.
